pages.text: $(li)The Composter is a block that converts biological material, like Crops, or Saplings into $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l).$(br)$(li)To use it, just right click on it while you have that kind of items on your hand.
$(li)If this block is placed near of a Villager without a job, it will be turned into a $(l:patchouli:villagers/farmer)Farmer$(/l).
